function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poverty increases vulnerability to vector-borne diseases (VBDs) by limiting people's ability to cope with health risks.","Impact":"Increased risk of VBD spread and impact due to lack of capacity to address health risks.","Mitigation":"Implement poverty alleviation strategies to improve access to healthcare and resources.","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure, community development programs, financial support systems.","People":"Poverty-stricken populations in areas affected by VBDs.","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, healthcare providers."},{"Description":"Complex interplay of social, cultural, economic, and environmental factors contributes to vulnerability to VBDs.","Impact":"Difficulty in addressing VBD spread due to multi-layered, interconnected risk factors.","Mitigation":"Integrated approach addressing social, cultural, economic, and environmental determinants of vulnerability.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, data analytics, community engagement platforms.","People":"Communities at risk of VBD transmission, public health agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, community leaders."},{"Description":"Difficulty in standardizing metrics for measuring vulnerability to VBDs across different contexts.","Impact":"Challenges in decision-making and resource allocation for VBD mitigation due to lack of standardized metrics.","Mitigation":"Develop context-specific metrics and frameworks for measuring vulnerability to VBDs.","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning algorithms, geographic information systems (GIS).","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers, government agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, policy development organizations."}]}
